adHeader: Add some Fire to your Events!
adDetails: Make your event really pop by adding a little heat! We are a troupe of fire dancers based in Sonoma County where we have performed at festivals, art openings, taverns, farmers markets, fund raisers, private parties, weddings and many other events. We mainly dance to choreographed routines and can also free-style or key our performance to your event theme. Our performance tools include: long staff, poi, double staves, hula hoop, fire fans, fire wand, snake poi, and fire sword. Watch our promo video at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jxZZwECqrJ8&feature=autoshare Get more information on our troupe and booking info at: http://www.ariesfirearts.com/ And like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/pages/Aries-Fire-Arts-Collective/166128376785781?ref=ts&fref=ts Client Testimonial: "My fianc√© and I hired the Aries Fire Arts Collective for our August wedding in Mendocino.
